title: Two of a family gunned down in Usta Muhammad - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
DERA MURAD JAMALI: Two members of a family were gunned down and one injured in Khanpur area of Usta Muhammad district on Thursday.

Police said six assailants on three motorcycles, who were armed with automatic weapons, ambushed the victims’ car at Khanpur Bridge.

The sprayed the car with bullets, killing Abdul Rahim Gola and Fateh Muhammad Gola on the spot.

The injured man, identified as Mir Muhammad, was rushed to the Usta Muhammad District Hhospital.

All three men belonged to the same family.

The victims’ family members later blocked the Dera Allah Yar-Usta Muhammad road and demanded immediate arrest of the attackers.

Published in Dawn, March 7th, 2025
